name: Hart Environment Demo
description:
First ever project in Unity woo hoo! 
Controls: 
Arrow Keys to move
Shift to run
Use Mouse to look around

Find any other controls? Cool! I sure didn't. Have fun!

This game uses assets from the following asset packs: 
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-for...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/mystic-runestone-82041

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/translucent-crystals-106274

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/wood/wooden-floor-ma...

Music: "He's a Long Way From Home" by Emily Argoff
